summary: A young Tutsi woman and a young Hutu man fall in love amidst chaos; a soldier struggles to foster a greater good while absent from her family; and a priest grapples with his faith in the face of unspeakable horror.
cast: Cassandra Freeman|Edouard Bamporiki|Cleophas Kabasita|Mazimpaka Kennedy|Hadidja Zaninka|Hassan Kabera|Abdallah Uwimana|Marc Gwamaka|Mutsari Jean|Kena Onyenjekwe|Assumpta Micho|Ayuub Kasasa Mago|Watta Hezekis|Munyantore Bashil|Ibrahim Kasuiya|Farida Uwimana|Ismael Dusengemuanga|Ally Majaliwa|Daisy Batamuliza
title: Kinyarwanda
